channel.title: Comments on: Is anyone out there?

item.title: By: awanda
item.dc:creator: awanda
item.description: I'm here too. I was meaning to read it more frequently. I started at the beginning and then got behind posts and am on a marathon reading all of May's travels, which are really quite exciting. Please don't stop updating as I'm enjoying reading your travel experiences. This is really a great way to document it all.
item.content:encoded: I’m here too. I was meaning to read it more frequently. I started at the beginning and then got behind posts and am on a marathon reading all of May’s travels, which are really quite exciting. Please don’t stop updating as I’m enjoying reading your travel experiences. This is really a great way to document it all.

item.title: By: scott
item.dc:creator: scott
item.description:
Echoing the above!
I've had a few hefty marathon sessions of getting caught up with your guys' travels here and there. And for some vacationers, damn, you write a lot!
The "Largest Lenin" photo with Mr. Sowrey was quite amusing. ;)
item.content:encoded:
Echoing the above!

I’ve had a few hefty marathon sessions of getting caught up with your guys’ travels here and there. And for some vacationers, damn, you write a lot!

The “Largest Lenin” photo with Mr. Sowrey was quite amusing. ðŸ˜‰

item.title: By: Torin
item.dc:creator: Torin
item.description: I'm reading as well... No time to comment, some jerk left me with all his work.
item.content:encoded: I’m reading as well… No time to comment, some jerk left me with all his work.

item.title: By: judemat
item.dc:creator: judemat
item.description: I am loving the details. Keep it up por favor!
item.content:encoded: I am loving the details. Keep it up por favor!

item.title: By: Kate F.
item.dc:creator: Kate F.
item.description: I'm defintely reading! Wish I was there for sure... just hadn't taken the time to create a login to post comments. You two have a great time and stay safe!
item.content:encoded: I’m defintely reading! Wish I was there for sure… just hadn’t taken the time to create a login to post comments. You two have a great time and stay safe!

item.title: By: carin13
item.dc:creator: carin13
item.description: i'm reading all the time (ok, i've slacked in the last few days). in fact, i realize i'm probably the one of amy's friends that you were referring to. i've loved reading about and seeing pictures of your crazy adventures! :o)
item.content:encoded: i’m reading all the time (ok, i’ve slacked in the last few days). in fact, i realize i’m probably the one of amy’s friends that you were referring to. i’ve loved reading about and seeing pictures of your crazy adventures! :o)

item.title: By: chiquitadequeso
item.dc:creator: chiquitadequeso
item.description: I check in the mornings after I get into work or sometime in the afternoon half. I don't get to go many places, so it's great to hear about them.
item.content:encoded: I check in the mornings after I get into work or sometime in the afternoon half. I don’t get to go many places, so it’s great to hear about them.

item.title: By: Julie
item.dc:creator: Julie
item.description: I'm reading it! I'm reading it!!

item.title: By: elabeth
item.dc:creator: elabeth
item.description: I'm out here. I read the RSS Feed through Bloglines, and I'm really enjoying reading the updates that both of you guys post. I never get to go anywhere, so this is great for me. :)
item.content:encoded: I’m out here. I read the RSS Feed through Bloglines, and I’m really enjoying reading the updates that both of you guys post. I never get to go anywhere, so this is great for me. ðŸ™‚
